display_long_description:
Welcome to GorillaCoons — a wild, chaotic, and hilarious VR fan game inspired by the beloved Gorilla Tag, but with a mischievous raccoon twist.

Climb, crawl, wall-bounce, and launch yourself through colorful environments using only your hands—no buttons, no sticks—just raw raccoon-gorilla energy. Whether you're dodging taggers, chasing down your next victim, or just goofing around with friends, GorillaCoons brings nonstop VR movement mayhem with a unique style and community spirit.

🏃 Key Features:

Raccoon-Powered Locomotion: Play as hybrid gorilla-raccoons built for speed and chaos.

Tag Modes & Mini-Games: Infection, freeze tag, and more game modes with a twist.

Mod-Friendly & Community Driven: Custom maps, player skins, and mod support coming soon.

Express Yourself: Wear silly hats, unlock cosmetics, and show off your inner trash panda.

Social Playground: Join public or private lobbies and explore with your crew.

If you're a Gorilla Tag fan or just love wild VR movement games, GorillaCoons is your next addiction. Join the pack and swing your way into the madness.
